nodes.text: Boba Fett and Other Bounty Hunters and Criminals
"Boba Fett and Other Bounty Hunters and Criminals" is the eighteenth booklet in a series of canon reference booklets titled the Star Wars Encyclopedia and was published on March 2, 2021.

Bounty hunters are soldiers of fortune specially trained to locate, hunt down, and capture (dead or alive) the most diverse targets. Because of their craft, they have always been highly sought after professionals across the galaxy. From crime lords to Galactic Empires to private clients, no one is free to need the services they offer at some point.
